title: Edge of Dawn
description: They were caught in the flash fire of turbulent change.. It was an era of astounding achievement and stunning violence, when a dazed nation saw the images of triumph and tragedy flicker across the television screen. Suddenly network news anchormen became the spokesmen for the most exhausting, amazing events in history.At IBS, one anchorman attracted almost as much attention as the news. Youthful, rugged Matthew Callahan reported the news with brisk control. But behind his steady gaze were thoughts of Teresa, the dark-haired beauty he had known since childhood, the woman who gave him all her heart.They had known each other forever, loved one another always. But theirs was a time when forevers were shattered, and love had never been more precious....
author: Maura Seger
